Elevtor

Elevtor is a start-up from Austin, Texas who will revolutionize bringing the speed of videos to the job searching industry.
Since I'm one of the co-founders of Elevtor, we started from the idea up from the ground and developed mockups for both the consumer side, as well as the business side of the platform.
From the mockup, I developed the flowchart to structure the system.
With both at hands, I begun developing the screens to fulfill the mockups needs.
From the mockup, at the same time I developed the logo for it and started working with my partner on this project on the screens.
The main difference of Elevtor is shown by having the interview screens, which happen on demand.
The difference between the upper ones and the lower ones are being from the Consumer side and the Business side, the second one allowing to record the whole interview.
Some of the screens produced included the job searching pages.
And scheduling interviews for those jobs.
From the business side, we have major pages as the dashboard - in two possible versions.
And management pages, as the job listings one and the team management screen.
I also produced marketing material, as the splash page.
And the whole animation of this video.
